snippet: An important new bill seeks to protect nearly 150 million acres in northern Quebec from industrial development and sets a remarkable precedent for sustainable use.
abstract: Editorial praises important environmental bill proposed by Quebec's Premier Jean Charest that seeks to protect nearly 150 million acres of forestry in northern Quebec from industrial development; says bill sets a remarkable precedent for sustainable use.
lead_paragraph: An important new bill seeks to protect nearly 150 million acres in northern Quebec from industrial development and sets a remarkable precedent for sustainable use.
